values:
HAPPY THANKSGIVING U ALL!

Hope you have a good one. I'm personally freezin my a$$ off right now cuz my smart brother knows how to keep a fire going....

TTYL MORE! 

<3 ally
http://sugarcoatin.livejournal.com/11460.html

Hey guys!

Well I guess I got out of my LJ routine, but I wont let that happen again...newayz, I got a flu or fever or w/e u wanna call it right now so I'm home on this pretty fall-y monday. whats been happening??? not that much. well good stuff newayz. im grounded right now which totally SUCKS and i dont wanna even go into why I am but just believe me that I am!!! lol. yea. I'm getting a little worried tho, because I'm falling behind in my college process. UGH. I dont wanna write essays or any of that shit at all. ugghhhh :( 

OMG I hate these chills, then they turn into hot flashes. They're really bad too. The only thing making me feel good is looking down at my fake fingernails that I got done at Hollywood Nails w/ Danielle. That was fun. This weekend Jocelyn should be sleeping over if all goes well. 


TTYL

 <3 ally 

                  DONT TALK SHIT OR ULL REGRET ITTTTTTT

Did you know : That 'Cheers' means "Thanks" in England? Well most kids say it anyway, I learned this when my bro's england kid said 'cheers' to me when I gave him something, and I was like, wheres the drink? haha. Speaking of drink, I'm hoping to visit Mike this weekend at college and his friend Steph wants to take my partying [haha thanks mike, I knew you told her about that! ;)] So that will be fun. 

Yea I'm really stressed out right now, and I wont go into why, but this week with the 1/2 days wont help at all but I guess it's better than a whole day. I luv the FALL here. I think thats the best season for this place....but yea. My eyes are really dry right now. Ugh. 

BUT OK ... so noone told me their halloween plans yet. And I can take that as a hint meaning no one wants me included in their plans, or that no one has any. Hmm...but ok. 

 Gotta go do something that I don't know what it is yet. But I'm gonna think about it.

 <3 ally
http://sugarcoatin.livejournal.com/10691.html

so things are just kinda hanging right now, relationships are 'friendly' lets just say, and on hold I think. which is cool I guess, cuz its the whole casual thing which is ME lol. homecoming was ok, could always be better tho, but happy Meg Honey was Queen- she deserved it. 

so todays monday and mondays already suck, but I just found out that my show Prison Break is on hold for yet ANOTHER week...all these sports games are killin me! AHHHHH ... so nothing else is really new. This wednesday is the college fair, which Im going to, BUT I always thought u missed that school day, apparently not and you have to still go after the 1/2 day. WTF that sucks...

 and HALLOWEEN is right   around    the         corner, huh? 

*Whats everyones plans for Halloween?* I have none right now, and I wanna do something fun, lol remember Deana our plan? haha. leave some ideas...

<3 ally

So today I bought my homecoming dress- it's black..and little lmao. I got it a b*tru.. its really cute. Jocey got a dress too and looks really good on her - it's like a pinkish color .. cute.

Anyone else goin to homecoming?? hmmm?? yea losers! thats what i thought. 


<3 ally

Hey Guys.

I want to have a personal and private life to some sense, but I will let you guys, my CLOSE friends know that I am no longer single! hehe. And who, may you ask is the very lucky man [lol]? Well, you'll find out sooner or later I think, who I'm walking with in the halls...

It's not who you think!



<3
http://sugarcoatin.livejournal.com/9743.html

I luv those drinks, Sobe LizFuels. 
LAST NIGHT WAS AWESOME- I'm soooo fuckin amped that Mike is down 4 the weekend, even tho netty and mike are going to be leaving after this weekend :( But we definitely had a fuckin awesome last night...couldn't ask for better. Little tired tho now, and have the worst headache EVER. Soo I'm just waitin to see if we're gonna try to hang before I go to Jocey's at 4pm for her party later that night, etc. I luv 3-day weekends!! 

Bored outta my mind right now, and I know I'm supposed to be unloading dishwasher, etc and other chores...w/e. Oh shit and I gotta study 4 health too. oh well...

ttyl..

ally
http://sugarcoatin.livejournal.com/9723.html

If only you read that letter...
that letter I wrote to my friend Mike, expressing my feelings that Monday. Ughh....but now I can't wait to burn that letter! [You may not want to know what I'm talking about lol, but just know I was PISSED]
But it's Thursday now, and the 3-day weekend is here! If you're free this weekend, let me know in Comments...maybe we can hang. Mike's still not 100% positive on if he can come down this weekend, let's hope so. 

AND IF YOU HAVENT BROUGHT IN YOUR BABY PICTURE YET, PLEASE GIVE ME ONE ASAP....i'm doin the baby pics and I've gotten like, 12 pictures lol. It can be a baby or toddler, etc. doesn't matter, just bring somethin in. 

And a grendel test tomorrow? HA! Well, there went MY grade. I swear to God, I read the whole book and I just don't comprehend it. I will fail it, and Ms Cowan will be a bitch to me and say shit, and I'll just be like, BACK OFF Biotch. I dont like reading about monsters. Sorry- I thought this was SENIOR year lmao.

OK...gonna NOT go study 4 Grendel b/c what's the point? 


ally
http://sugarcoatin.livejournal.com/9276.html

Wow, where did October come in the picture? Well, it feels like it, that's for sure. FREEEZINNN at night! I put on my flannel sheets today...I always dread that moment, but when leaves change colors, its a kodak moment. Speaking of cameras [lol] oops! I'm supposed to be doing a photo assignment. That didn't happen. And right now I'm supposed to be reading 'Grendel'. That book SUCKS. I have such ADD when I have to read it cuz I don't follow. 
This whole weekend was a blur. Friday- went to Kandace's bday party, Sat- worked 9-6pm and slept over netty's [saw sunset in grace's boat..so cool!] and today I was at the market in the morning and came home. Ugh. 

k, better go actually do hw. 

ally
http://sugarcoatin.livejournal.com/8961.html

..and the college stress has begun...

I feel like running away and never coming back. I'm going slowly insane right now, with my parents CONSTANTLY harrasing and asking me questions about college and shit. I can't take it already! AHH! This is really getting to me now. 

I really just wanna be like, ok...ha I dont wanna go if this is what you want to do to me. And I wanna do it for ME not u guys..but i'm gettin fed up with having to keep explaining myself over and OVER and OVER again. Is anyone else going thru this? Plz say yes lol. 

Tomorrow I'm going off island with my mom..she has to get an MRI in Yarmouth...and she's also really upset b/c she doesn't want to have surgery, she was told if she had to, it's the most painful kind. That's also another source of my stress, even tho it shouldnt be about me, but my dad is really naggin me about NOTHIN........im like BREATHE man relaxxxxxxx....

   AHH I gotta go scream w/ my pillow. hmmmmm

ally
http://sugarcoatin.livejournal.com/8831.html

1.) I've stopped caring what other people think...I did a long time ago, but I'm done with all caring shit.
2.) Don't gossip! It's immature and next time I hear a 'I heard that...' I'm gonna have a fit.
3.) I'm going to grow out my hair...
4.) Found out how much I do miss my friends who left for college, and cannot wait until they come to visit...or I'm takin the next boat off and finding my way there!
5.) It's senior year and I just wanna have fun, and try not to stress too much about college. It's my decision and I dont want to be influenced in any way on which one I want to attend. 
6.) I will admit, last night I really had a moment that I admitted to myself; I WILL miss the Vineyard! It will be hard without it, the comfort...
7.) I have a tea obsession.
8.) I want to have one good memory to have with anyone who is reading this right now...some we've been discussing ;)
9.) Get to know a person BEFORE you start to judge. 
10.) Be a good, supportive friend, because some really need one.

Well that definitely was one of my more 'deep' entries lol, I guess that's what you get while listening to the Goo Goo Dolls. It's true, actually, the influence of music when you're writing...
http://sugarcoatin.livejournal.com/8653.html

My head feels like a boulder fell off a cliff, ricochetted  [yea not spelt right] and landed on it, cracked it open, and my brains spelt out and then a pack of crows came and started eatin away. In other words, I got a migraine.

I tried taking a nap but then I realized I had hw to do so I couldn't relax...talkin to my friend Jocelyn right now on AIM. funny.

So yea not much is new w/ me right now. It feels weird cuz I wanna do a million things at once but I can't, so I'm like blowing them all off...and I dont wanna do that. You know that feeling? Cuz I wanted to join a couple of clubs but that didn't work out, or it can't right now. I'm gonna start working out with Megan after school if I CAN do self gym. I haven't even talked to Ms. Schemeth yet, and I don't know how well that will go since my schedule isn't filled [and it's supposed to be w/ no study halls or nothin] 

Ok I feel like shit. So I'm gonna go.

 TTYL

       ally
http://sugarcoatin.livejournal.com/8286.html

Hey Guys. Well, so far I've been basically on my computer all day figuring myspace out, talking to ppl on AIM, etc. Pretty exciting, heh? Yea. Tomorrow's Monday. But it's senior year and I'm really not dragging through the week like I used to. Ok. I think I'm gonna have some tea and watch MONK. Oh like this???
Your love is... by ChibiMarronchan
Your name is...
Your kiss is...mysterious
Your hugs are...gentle
Your eyes...twinkle in the moonlight
Your touch is...the only thing I desire
Your smell is...exotic
Your smile is...encouraging
Your love is...one of a kind
Quiz created with MemeGen!

Well, there will be puddles tomorrow....I like rainy days, nights, but not when it floods or basement, or is just too damp. Ohhh lightning!!! 

Not much has been happening, not a lot of homework [senior year!!!] Or maybe it's just because I'm not taking math or science, and those seem like the two subjects that HAVE homework.

I'm not sure if I'm gonna go to the football game tomorrow? eh, not sure. maybe. [For you lucie!!!!]

I'm watching Duplex right now...it's so funny and cute! Drew Barrymore and Ben Stiller are really good together. Gotta work 9-6pm Saturday...wish me luck! I'm gonna fall asleep- it's gonna be SOOO slow down in Menemsha.

TTYL,

ally
http://sugarcoatin.livejournal.com/7569.html

and ya that's supposed to sound bad. But c'mon, if you saw this guy, [http://www.dinotopia.com/wentworth.gif ]you would think the same thing, right? OMG. Too hot for TV. That's sadly 1/2 the reason I watch 'Prison Break' in the first place, but it's a really good show anyways. 

It's soooo hot in my room right now- the fan is going and it hasn't for weeks! What is this? I just hate it when it's humid at night. Pisses me off.

Tomorrow is Tuesday....ugh. Long week still. But not that bad....hey I have lunch in English class so not bad! [Deana, Kandace, and Meg are there] So far, I actually like all the different lunch times, b/c then you can eat w/ alot of diff. people. Just sux if there aren't tho. 

TTYL,

ally
http://sugarcoatin.livejournal.com/7352.html

1.) I don't like the OC. I won't lie. It's boring and NONE of the guys are hot.
2.) I lovveee Prison Break tho, as well as CSI
3.) I want to be a Criminal Profiler for a profession
4.) I dont drink soda
5.) I just downloaded three songs on iTunes that I probably had on a CD somewhere....oh well
6.) Napoleon Dynamite is an awesome movie. Not my fav, but entertaining. 
7.) BACK TO THE FUTURE IS THE BEST MOVIE!!!!! [home alone, too!]
8.) Talkin to my friend Dinah right now on AIM. She's in college!  :(
9.) Confession: I think some of the freshmen boys are cute. Ok, kinda hot. 
10.)I have a dance group; practices are every week. We prefer to dance hip hop.
11.) Seinfeld cracks me up sooo hard. Same with RENO 911!!!! Awesome people and concept.
12.) Right now it's pitch black in my room. Kinda creepy. 
13.) Right now, my fav. color is green. And I think it will stay that way. 
14.) My eyes are hazel..at least I'd like to think so.
15.) Dave Matthews Band is my favorite music group...but I have my hip hop favorites..it all depends on my moods...
16.) Pet peeves: Cocky guys, [they usually lack them anyways] gossiping, [even tho its tempting, I know] the sound of ripping paper!!! It kills my ears. Scratching on the board it's ok tho.
17.) I'm listening to a song [Sheryl Crow "It dont hurt"] for the 35th time today probably. And I never heard the song before today. So I'm officially obsessed, I think? 
18.) My iPod is basically broken. We're gonna send it back to see what's up.
19.) Tomorrow's monday. Ugh. But a good day considering I have no academic classes [well, health?]
20.) ok last fact! somethin interesting...I WANT A DOG FOR THE LIFE OF ME. Preferably a German Sheperd, or Golden Retriever. I'll get one soon enough.

After watching at least 4 episodes of 'Tommy Lee goes to College' I've realized he is a very hot piece of ASS. Oh yes. He is! It's a funny ass show, too. I've been laughin my ass off for the past couple of hours.
So I'll be off this weekend and I'll be back later on Sunday, no idea what time...
I'll catch back on ur LJ's when I return. This year will be a fun but interesting one. My classes are cool I guess, except for a couple....see some of u in study on Mon...SIGN UP FOR LIBRARY!

ally

Not much is goin on right now, school could be better. Rules suck, and so does the schedule. I totally forgot how lunches are affected by the schdule too, but at least there's a bigger chance of having lunch with any of you guys. 

I dont watch the OC, but the 'whole BIG premiere' is tonight and everyone will be talking about it tomorrow, and that sounds like a shitty reason to watch, but if nothing else is on, I might as well. 

Ok. Running out of things to say. I'll be off island this weekend. Anyone wanna do something Friday? I'm bored as hell w/o my people :(

ally

 And then, sadly enough, I'll have to start thinking about making up my SCHOOL bag. UGHHHH  and EWWWW. I still want to be in denial, but I dont think I can be for too much longer! I never posted my schdule for u guys, but we'll talk on the first day and see. 
 
  Ok, gotta go pack. 

 ally

ok so it's almost all over. my closest friends at least! mike left this Thurs. even tho it feels like a year already. Dinah leaves next Thurs, our first day of school, and Annette will be leaving at the end of this month. AHHHHH!!!!! What am I gonna do? 

People are just like, "They'll be back on breaks" and I'm like, yea. but still. and plus, most of the time I leave for the breaks, so I won't even be able to spend time w/ them. It sucks. I'm finding out that I'm really a dependent person. But I know that I need time on my own for awhile, to see what it's like anyways. 

Ok, I'm blabbing on and i don't want to start crying :( 
 
 
 I dont know what I'm doin tonight. Hangin with dinah I think....OUR LAST TIME TOGETHER!!!


ally
http://sugarcoatin.livejournal.com/5148.html

Ok so right now I'm waitin for Dinah to show up, and we're gonna hang for awhile and go to OB later. MIKE IS LEAVIN TOMORROW!!!! SOOO sad. It's gonna be so weird w/o him. [gonna take awhile to sink in]

 So hopefully Mike stops by once more, also cuz Dinah wants to see him again.

 [Ok dinah just called, and she's gonna be a little later than expected...came back from beach and has to take shower, etc. Ohh Dinah, ur so dependable! :) ]

   Ok, gotta go. To be honest, I don't. But I'm tired of typing. 
 
 Out.

Saturday I went off to finish my basic shopping. Got a bag, [for school..hopefully its big enough], sneakers, tops/sweaters. No pants really...I did that last time :)

So Mike leaves this Thursday!!!!! :( :( :( :( So him, me and annette [wow thats really not 'literate' or w/e] are gonna hang out tonight. One of the last times :(

    Working 3-9pm later. Ugh. 

TTYL,

ally

Sorry for the lack of updates. Been workin, hangin, and just not much has happened!

I did go off island on Saturday, bought 7 pairs of jeans, and like, no tops. But thats a seperate trip. 
I'm still in denial that school is like, right around the corner. WTF did the summer go?! Ah. And I need to go to that guidance-switch-classes thingy, cuz I didn't do any of the honors english work! lol. too late. 

Fair is this week, too! I think I'm gonna go Saturday night. Maybe I'll see some of you guys there? Cant go to the fireworks...gotta work :(

Well, if you got ur schedule in the mail and aren't gonna change it, leave it in the comments so I can see if we have any of the same classes. I think I'm gonna have like 4 study halls .... lol.

ally

PS- I ruined a new shirt with a little bleach stain, so I'm gonna take a whirl at trying to design a whole thing on it WITH a clorox bleach pen. wish me luck lol!

My new addiction: Guns. 

Not kidding.

I'm doin target shooting w/ my bro, (BB's....well, not plastic ones. Let's just say you don't wanna get hit w/ one of these babies...) And I'm gonna order this gun pretty soon, my uncle actually will. (He owns a gun shop)

http://www.gamo-airguns.com/air-pistol-v3-silver.htm

I'm pretty good. I'm a natural, what can I say? It's fun. It's also a good stress reliever!!!!  I want the human head targets next. Hehe.

So we go to the AC last night, and when we got in, we didn't see hardly any people (and this is like at 10:30pm). We're just looking at each other like, "Wow. Pretty boring". But then, as the night went on, more and more people showed up and it became more 'interesting'. (I grinded w/ a person I'm not going to name, for my own sake.) So it was FUN...us three (you should know by now-Mike, Annette, and Me) danced that fuckin night away. It was fun...I think we're gonna do it next week too. I want to at least. 

And anyone who said that Teen Night sux is wrong. At least w/ the summer boys.  :)


ally

annette's bf and fam backed out on coming this week, too. I guess too long of a drive or somethin. so that's on hold as well. other than that, not much has been goin on. OH WAIT.

I want to know soon, cuz I think mike and annette are gonna go ahead and do it w/o me this week! :(

Whatever. Well, if anyone is in OB tonight, and going to teen night, LOL...look for us. Holy shit, are we gonna rock that dance floor. Me and Annette have been making up 'moves' at work. LOL. Funny shit.

But nothing will happen. Hopefully not, b/c I want it to be fun tonight. 

Let u know what happens! Check back prob. tomorrow.

Ally

Oh and I saw Hannah in town last night, Lucie. Don't you love when you don't see her walking by, and she just grabs one of your body parts? Oh that's fun. (serious face)

I'm psyched for that shit. YESSSSS. Anyways, anything new with you guys? So far, my summer could be better. Work, work, work, and not enough play. At least I don't think so. Work again 3-9pm tonight, and that day so far as been eery looking. Cloudy, rainy-ish, but not?

And I'm kinda running late...I wanna take a shower by 10am so I can watch my soap opera. It's gettin good!

http://sugarcoatin.livejournal.com/2651.html

Today I did my first Tarot (prounounced Tar-row, not actually Tar-oT!)Card reading. 

Overall, it seemed very accurate. I decided to do the 'Planetary Spread' which includes seven cards, that you lay out in the shape of a star. In the star shape, each point has it's topic: For instance, Home Matters/Family. Or Love and relationships, Business matters, etc. And when you see what card is drawn out in that particular place, it reflects on what is/will happen to it. I personally liked it, and like the particular spread for me, at least, because it focuses on what's currently happening, and in the near future. Have I lost you yet? Probably. 

But it was fun, and enlightening. The only part that's a drag is after every reading, you have to put all the cards back into the exact place. (That's because you have to shuffle thoroughly). 

And I desperately need a bag for them, too! Anyone have any velvet or cool smallish bags you don't need? Let me know. lol.) 

Goin to work 3-9pm. TTYL,

ally
http://sugarcoatin.livejournal.com/2556.html
